mapper.select: SELECT roleName FROM staffing_role sr LEFT JOIN staffing_role_emp sre ON sre.roleId = sr.roleId WHERE sre.empId = (SELECT se.empId FROM staffing_emp se WHERE se.username = #{username}) AND sr.enterpriseId = #{enterpriseId}

SELECT DISTINCT sp.* FROM staffing_permission sp LEFT JOIN staffing_role_permission srp ON srp.permissionId = sp.permissionId WHERE srp.roleId IN ( SELECT sr.roleId FROM staffing_role sr LEFT JOIN staffing_role_emp sre ON sre.roleId = sr.roleId WHERE sre.empId = (SELECT se.empId FROM staffing_emp se WHERE se.username = #{username}) AND sr.enterpriseId = #{enterpriseId})
